meanings.definition: The use of living organisms or biological systems in the development of products or processes.
meanings.sent1: The biotech industry is focused on creating new medicines from natural sources.
meanings.sent2: Scientists in the biotech field study how to use bacteria to clean up oil spills.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke about a biotech company trying to make plants that grow pizza slices.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a biotech lab, constantly experimenting with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was like a bustling biotech lab, full of students exploring the mysteries of life.

meanings.definition: The application of technology to biological systems for research or industrial purposes.
meanings.sent1: Biotech companies are working on developing new ways to produce renewable energy.
meanings.sent2: The biotech sector is growing rapidly as more advancements are made in genetic engineering.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd see a robot working alongside a biotech scientist in the lab!
meanings.sent4: Her smartphone was a marvel of biotech innovation, combining technology and biology seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The city was a buzzing hive of biotech activity, with researchers and engineers collaborating on groundbreaking projects.
